name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image Viewer from Right Click Menu

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow opening the image viewer from the contextmenu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to
① Right click on the image.
② Click "Image Viewer from Right Click Menu" from contextmenu.
③ Zoom/Rotate/Invert the image.

Just a tool.

Powered by viewerjs.
